name: Mario extended in the autumn afternoon
name_original: Mario extended in the autumn afternoon
description:
I want you to walk through the eerie dreamscape De Chirico presents in his surrealist town plaza painting series.

De Chirico painted often as if he was a passenger in a passing train. Life moves along and some things change, but mostly he saw warped versions of the reality that we see everyday.

This one week student project is Super Mario 1-1 remade in his style. The game has audio please have headphones/speakers connected.

Made for Windows.

Input: keyboard.

Credits are found within the game.
